desc: More Than Just Fireworks. Freedom Hoops Fireworks does more than supply all of your Fourth of July needs. Our stand is connected to the non-profit organization Freedom Hoops that uses basketball to reach young men in Kansas City, Missouri.

layout.text: We will be open June 29th - July 4th from 9AM to 10PM. Visit us in person at 4001 Mission Road, KC, KS
